description.raw: The ball bearing was escaping the `round_tin_*` meshes. It seemed that the ball_bearing model was only generating contact when it hit one of the edges of the trimesh; it seemed to pass directly through triangles. I wasn't able to figure out what caused the problem. Instead I increased the density of the meshes. I also simplified the meshes so that they have a plain cylinder on the bottom and the meshes are just the walls of the tins. The inertia doesn't account for the base of the tins yet either...
